text:
Hi Everyone, not sure if I am in the right channel for this question but I really need to figure out the cause for this issue.
Please have a look at the two links attached and the reference screenshot. I am wondering why some of the blog section size gets smaller which seems happened randomly and I am not able to see the logic behind it.
<https://www.realtimenetworks.com/blog/page/6>
<https://www.realtimenetworks.com/blog/page/1>

Hey <@U029GNM3MAL>

Pretty sure *display: inline-block;* is causing this, see the class *.blog-tmpl .post-item*
